    • Method Detail

      • encryptPayload

        public EncodedPayload encryptPayload(byte[] message,
                                     PublicKey senderPublicKey,
                                     List<PublicKey> recipientPublicKeys)
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Encrypts a message using the specified sender and a list of recipients. Returns a EncodedPayload which contains all the encrypted information, including the recipients and their encrypted master keys.
        Specified by:
        encryptPayload in interface Enclave
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be encrypted
        senderPublicKey - the public key which this enclave manages
        recipientPublicKeys - the recipients to encrypt this message for
        Returns:
        the encrypted information, represented by an EncodedPayload

      • createNewRecipientBox

        public byte[] createNewRecipientBox(EncodedPayload payload,
                                    PublicKey publicKey)
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Creates a new recipient box for the payload, for which we must be the originator. At least one recipient must already be available to be able to decrypt the master key.
        Specified by:
        createNewRecipientBox in interface Enclave
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload to add a recipient to
        publicKey - the new recipient key to add

      • encryptPayload

        public EncodedPayload encryptPayload(RawTransaction rawTransaction,
                                     List<PublicKey> recipientPublicKeys)
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Decrypts a RawTransaction so that it can be re-encrypted into a EncodedPayload with the given recipient list
        Specified by:
        encryptPayload in interface Enclave
        Parameters:
        rawTransaction - the transactiopn to decrypt and re-encrypt with recipients
        recipientPublicKeys - the recipients to encrypt the transaction for
        Returns:
        the encrypted information, represented by an EncodedPayload

      • encryptRawPayload

        public RawTransaction encryptRawPayload(byte[] message,
                                        PublicKey sender)
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Encrypt a payload without any recipients that can be retrieved later. The payload is encrypted using the private key that is related to the given public key.
        Specified by:
        encryptRawPayload in interface Enclave
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be encrypted
        sender - the sender's public key to encrypt the transaction with
        Returns:
        the encrypted transaction

      • unencryptTransaction

        public byte[] unencryptTransaction(EncodedPayload payload,
                                   PublicKey providedSenderKey)
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Decrypt a transaction and fetch the original message using the given public key. Throws an NaclException if the provided public key OR one of the Enclave's managed keys cannot be used to decrypt the payload
        Specified by:
        unencryptTransaction in interface Enclave
        Parameters:
        payload - the encrypted payload
        providedSenderKey - the key to use for decryption, if the payload wasn't sent by this Enclave
        Returns:
        the original, decrypted message

      • defaultPublicKey

        public PublicKey defaultPublicKey()
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Retrieves the public key to use if no key is specified for an operation There is no guarantee this key remains the same between runs of the Enclave.
        Specified by:
        defaultPublicKey in interface Enclave
        Returns:
        the public key that has been assigned as the default

      • getForwardingKeys

        public Set<PublicKey> getForwardingKeys()
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Returns a set of public keys that should be included as recipients to all transactions produced by this node. The keys are not be managed by this node.
        Specified by:
        getForwardingKeys in interface Enclave
        Returns:
        the set of public keys to be added to transactions

      • getPublicKeys

        public Set<PublicKey> getPublicKeys()
        Description copied from interface: Enclave
        Returns all the public keys that are managed by this Enclave.
        Specified by:
        getPublicKeys in interface Enclave
        Returns:
        all public keys managed by this Enclave
